item.title: Menu
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded: [arr.create set=module.args] [menu new label='Dashboard' class='btn-fourth' link='{site_url}/dashboard/' /] [menu new label='Access Request' class='btn-secondary' link='{app.path}/home' /] [/arr.create] [module.return module.args.menu /]

item.title: Layout
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded: [backend_design.layout /]

item.title: parse-activity-elements
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[loop.@content_element module.content_element not_empty='{module.content_element}'] [if.yes module.repeater] [php.str_replace p1=".1." p2=".{{aw2.get repeater.num}}." p3="{module.main}" set="module.main" /] [/if.yes]
[if.equal lhs='{@content_element.item.name}' rhs='{module.main}'] [module.return @content_element.item.value /] [/if.equal] [/loop.@content_element]

item.title: content_builder_form
item.dc:creator: dev

item.title: common-css-js-editor-lib
item.dc:creator: dev

item.title: content
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add single_view] [if.empty template.content_id] [template.set msg='content id is missing' /] [template.return template.msg /] [/if.empty]
[module.set_array query] [query_count]no[/query_count] [pagesize]-1[/pagesize] [with] [sql] select post_id, meta_value as template_slug from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] where meta_key='content_template' and post_id ='[env.get template.content_id /]' [/sql]
[add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as content_elements from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on wp_postmeta.post_id=[module.previous_query_no /].post_id and meta_key='content_elements' [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, ID, post_content from [aw2.get wpdb.posts /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on [aw2.get wpdb.posts /].ID=[module.previous_query_no /].template_slug [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as form_fields from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on wp_postmeta.post_id=[module.previous_query_no /].ID and meta_key='form_fields' [/sql] [/add_field]
[/with] [/module.set_array] [db.meta_query query="{module.query}" set="template.rs"/]
[if.empty template.rs.rows] [template.set msg='data not found' /] [template.return template.msg /] [/if.empty] [template.set content_data={template.rs.rows.0} /] [template.set rs='' /]
[aw2.get template.content_data.content_elements.json_decode o.set='template.content_elements' /]
[loop.@cte template.content_elements] [aw2.get @cte.item.value o.set='template.activity.{@cte.item.name}' /] [/loop.@cte]
[aw2.get template.content_data.post_content.run o.set='template.content_data.content' /] [template.set content_data.activity='{template.activity}' /]
[template.return template.content_data /] [/templates.add]
[templates.add list_view] [if.empty template.content_ids] [template.set msg='content ids are missing' /] [template.return template.msg /] [/if.empty]
[template.get content_ids m.implode_on=' quote_comma' o.set='template.content_id' /]
[module.set_array query] [query_count]no[/query_count] [pagesize]-1[/pagesize] [with] [sql] select post_id, meta_value as template_slug from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] where meta_key='content_template' and post_id IN ([env.get template.content_id /]) [/sql]
[add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as content_elements from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on wp_postmeta.post_id=[module.previous_query_no /].post_id and meta_key='content_elements' [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, ID, post_content from [aw2.get wpdb.posts /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on post_name=[module.previous_query_no /].template_slug [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as form_fields from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on wp_postmeta.post_id=[module.previous_query_no /].ID and meta_key='form_fields' [/sql] [/add_field]
[/with] [/module.set_array] [db.meta_query query="{module.query}" set="template.rs"/]
[if.empty template.rs.rows] [template.set msg='data not found' /] [template.return template.msg /] [/if.empty]
[template.set_array all_content='' /] [loop.@content_data template.rs.rows] [template.set content_data={@content_data.item} /]
[aw2.get template.content_data.content_elements.json_decode o.set='template.content_elements' /]
[loop.@cte template.content_elements] [aw2.get @cte.item.value o.set='template.activity.{@cte.item.name}' /] [/loop.@cte]
[aw2.get template.content_data.post_content.run o.set='template.content_data.content'/] [template.set_array all_content.new activity='{template.activity}' content='{template.content_data.content}' post_id='{template.content_data.post_id}' /]
[/loop.@content_data]
[template.return template.all_content /]
[/templates.add]
[templates.add single_form] [if.empty template.content_id] [template.set msg='content id is missing' /] [template.return template.msg /] [/if.empty]
[module.set_array query] [query_count]no[/query_count] [pagesize]-1[/pagesize] [with] [sql] select post_id, meta_value as template_id from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] where meta_key='content_template' and post_id ='[env.get template.content_id /]' [/sql]
[add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as content_elements from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on wp_postmeta.post_id=[module.previous_query_no /].post_id and meta_key='content_elements' [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, ID, post_title, post_content from [aw2.get wpdb.posts /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on ID=[module.previous_query_no /].template_id [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].*, meta_value as form_fields from [aw2.get wpdb.postmeta /] join [module.previous_query_no /] on wp_postmeta.post_id=[module.previous_query_no /].ID and meta_key='form_fields' [/sql] [/add_field]
[/with] [/module.set_array] [db.meta_query query="{module.query}" set="template.rs"/]
[if.empty template.rs.rows] [template.set msg='data not found' /] [template.return template.msg /] [/if.empty] [template.set content_data={template.rs.rows.0} /] [template.set rs='' /]
[aw2.get template.content_data.content_elements.json_decode o.set='template.content_elements' /]
[loop.@cte template.content_elements] [aw2.get @cte.item.value o.set='template.activity.{@cte.item.name}' /] [/loop.@cte]
[aw2.get template.content_data.form_fields.run o.set='template.content_data.form'/] [template.set content_data.activity='{template.activity}' /]
[template.return template.content_data /] [/templates.add]

item.title: save_post_handler
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [query.update_post set='updated_post'] { "ID":[aw2.get request.post_id /], "post_title":"[aw2.get request.post_title /]" } [/query.update_post] [php.update_post_meta p1="{request.post_id}" p2="content_elements" p3="{request.question_elements}" /] [php.update_post_meta p1="{request.post_id}" p2="search_data" p3="{request.post_id} {request.search_data}" /]
[content_builder.log.add post_id="{request.post_id}" meta_key="last_edited_by" c.not_empty="{request.last_edited_by}" /]
//** [query.update_post_meta post_id="{request.post_id}" meta_key="search_data" meta_value="{request.post_title}" /] **// [query.update_post_meta post_id="{request.post_id}" meta_key="remarks" meta_value="{request.remarks}" /]
[query.set_post_terms post_id="{request.post_id}" taxonomy="skill" slugs="{request.skill}" /] [query.set_post_terms post_id="{request.post_id}" taxonomy="content_type" slugs="{request.content_type}" /] [query.set_post_terms post_id="{request.post_id}" taxonomy="post_tag" slugs="{request.Keywords}" /]
[template.set alert_class="alert-success" /] [template.set alert_msg="Content updated successfully." /] <template axn=selector.update selector='div.post-feedback' get='me.html'> [form_control.alert alert_class="{template.alert_class}" alert_msg="{template.alert_msg}" /] </template>
[/templates.add]

item.title: content-preview
item.dc:creator: dev

item.title: log
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add add]
[php.wp_get_current_user set="template.current_user_id" /] [query.update_post_meta post_id="{template.post_id}" meta_key="{template.meta_key}" meta_value="{template.current_user_id.ID}" set="template.t" /]
[php.current_time p1="mysql" set="template.timestamp" /] [query.update_post_meta post_id="{template.post_id}" meta_key="{template.meta_key}_timestamp" meta_value="{template.timestamp}" set="template.t" /] [/templates.add] [templates.add user] [php.get_user_by p1="ID" p2="{template.user_id}" set="template.u" /] [template.return template.u.display_name /] [/templates.add]

item.title: repeater
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [template.set ele_id='{token}' /] [loop.@activity module.content_elements] [aw2.get @activity.item.value set='repeater_activity_elements.{@activity.item.name}' /] [/loop.@activity]
[if.not_empty repeater_activity_elements.set] [loop.@repeater_activity repeater_activity_elements.set] [aw2.set repeater.num="{loop.index}" /]
[template.get content.run /]
[/loop.@repeater_activity] [/if.not_empty] [if.else]
[template.get content.run /]
[/if.else]

[/templates.add]

item.content:encoded:
[query.posts_builder part=start] { "posts_per_page": -1, "post_type": "[aw2.get qs.0 /]", "post_status": "publish", "order": "DESC", "orderby": "date" } [/query.posts_builder] [query.posts_builder part=meta_query] { "key": "search_data", "value": "[aw2.get request.q /]", "compare": "LIKE" } [/query.posts_builder] [query.posts_builder part=run set=results /]
[loop.@i results.posts]
[aw2.get @i.item.ID set="module.items.{@i.counter}.id" /] [aw2.get @i.item.post_title set="module.items.{@i.counter}.post_title" /]
[if.contains needle="{qs.0}" haystack="course_activity_type,quiz_question_type"] [aw2.get @i.item.meta.course_activity_desc set="module.items.{@i.counter}.post_content" /] [/if.contains] [if.not_contains needle="{qs.0}" haystack="course_activity_type,quiz_question_type"] [aw2.get @i.item.post_content set="module.items.{@i.counter}.post_content" /] [/if.not_contains]
[/loop.@i]
[aw2.get module.json_encode /]

item.title: content-preview
item.dc:creator: dev

item.title: slider-js
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
<script type="spa/axn" axn=core.run_script>
  spa.content_slider={};
  spa.content_slider.prerequisites={};
  spa.content_slider.prerequisites.js_files='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Swiper/3.3.1/js/swiper.jquery.min.js';
  spa.content_slider.prerequisites.css_files='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Swiper/3.3.1/css/swiper.min.css,https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twitter-bootstrap/3.3.7/css/bootstrap.min.css';
  
  spa.content_slider.init=function(){}
  
  spa.content_slider.new_questions=function(o){
    
    var el=o.el;
    var questions_data=$.parseJSON(el.text());
    var quiz_id = $('[role=quiz]').attr('quiz_id');
    
    //put the slider into the article tag
    spa[quiz_id]=questions_data;
    
    var question_html=this.question_html;
    var temp_html = "";
    var questions = $("[role='questions'] .swiper-wrapper");
    
    var question_list =  spa[quiz_id].questions;   
    
    $.each( question_list, function( index, value ){
      temp_html = $(question_html);
      temp_html.attr('question_id',value.id);
      questions.append(temp_html);
    });
    
    var activity_pos = question_list.map(function(o) { return o.id; }).indexOf(questions_data.questions[0].id);
    var slide = $('[role=questions]').find('[role=question]').eq(0);
    
    spa.me.replace({el:slide,route_module:'question/' + question_list[0].id});
    
    slide.attr('loaded', true);
    question_id = question_list[0].id;
    spa.content_slider.edit_approve_btn(question_id); 
    
    $('span#answered-questions').html(activity_pos);
    spa.content_slider.new_questionswiper_init({el:slide});
    }
  
    spa.content_slider.new_questionswiper_init=function(o){
    
    // 1 Slide Per View, 10px Between
    var swiper =  new Swiper('.swiper-container',{
      spaceBetween: 10,
      initialSlide: $("[role='quiz']").attr("active_slide"),
      slidesPerView: 1,
      observer:true,
      onlyExternal:true,
      autoHeight: true,
      preloadImages: true,
      updateOnImagesReady:true,	
      nextButton:"#next-question",
      prevButton:"#previous-question",
      onProgress: function(e){
        if(e.isBeginning){
            $('#previous-question').hide();
        } else if(e.isEnd){
            $('#next-question').hide();
        } else {
            $('#previous-question').show();
            $('#next-question').show();
        }
        
        if(e.isEnd){
            $('#next-question').hide();
        }
    },
      
      onSlideChangeEnd:spa.content_slider.change_slide
    });
    o.el.attr("loaded","yes");
    setTimeout(function(){
      $('.swiper-wrapper').css('height',$('.swiper-slide-active').outerHeight( true )+'px');
        spa.content_slider.check_correct_ans();
    },1000);
    
   
  }
  
  
  spa.content_slider.load_questions = function(o){
    var quiz_id = $('[role=quiz]').attr('quiz_id');
    $.each( spa[quiz_id].questions, function( index, value ){
      spa.common.get_module({},'question/' + value.id);
    });
    
  }
  
  spa.content_slider.change_slide=function(swiper){
    var slideset=$(swiper.container);
    var slide=slideset.find('[role=question]').eq(swiper.activeIndex);
    
     $(".swiper-slide-next").empty();
    $(".swiper-slide-prev").empty();
    
    
    var quiz_id = $('[role=quiz]').attr('quiz_id');
    $('.current_slide').html(swiper.activeIndex + 1);
    var question_id = spa[quiz_id].questions[swiper.activeIndex].id;
 
    spa.me.replace({el:$('[role=questions]').find('[role=question]').eq(swiper.activeIndex),route_module:'question/' + question_id});
    slide.attr("loaded","yes");
    setTimeout(function(){
      $('.swiper-wrapper').css('height',$('.swiper-slide-active').outerHeight( true )+'px');
      spa.content_slider.check_correct_ans();
        
    },1000);
    
    spa.content_slider.edit_approve_btn(question_id); 
    
    
  }
  
  
  spa.content_slider.edit_approve_btn=function(question_id){
    var ajax_url = "[app.path /]/ajax/edit-approve-btn";
    jQuery.ajax({
        url: ajax_url,
        data:{question_id:question_id},
        success: function (result) {
        var data = $.parseJSON(result);
          
          $("#edit").attr("href",data.edit);
          
          $("#approve").removeClass("hide");
          $("#approve").addClass(data.approve);
          $('#approve').attr("question_id",question_id);
        },
        error:function(){ console.log("some error occurred in edit_approw_btn function ") },
        cache: false
    });
   
  }
  
  spa.content_slider.post_status_change=function(o){
    var question_id = o.block.question_id
    var ajax_url = "[app.path /]/ajax/question-status-change";
    jQuery.ajax({
        url: ajax_url,
        data:{question_id:question_id},
        success: function (result) {
          $("#approve").addClass("hide");
        },
        error:function(){ console.log("some error occurred in edit_approw_btn function ") },
        cache: false
    });
  }
  
  spa.content_slider.check_correct_ans=function(){
    
    /*
    var str = $('.swiper-slide-active').attr("correct_answers");
    if(str !=""){
      var arr = str.split(",");
      $('.swiper-slide-active').find('input[type="checkbox"]').each(function(i) {
        if (arr.indexOf($(this).val()) !== -1) {
           $(this).prop('checked', true);
        }
      });
    }
    */
  }
  
  </script>

<template axn=core.register_command set=content_slider.question_html>
  <article role='question' class="swiper-slide pad-y-5 pad-x-4" loaded="no" answered="no">
  </article>
</template>

[if.equal lhs="{module.post_status}" rhs="publish"] [aw2.set my_array.approve="hide" /] [/if.equal]
[php.get_edit_post_link p1="{module.question_id}" set="module.post_url" /] [php.html_entity_decode p1="{module.post_url}" set="module.post_edit_url" /] [aw2.set my_array.edit="{app.path}/content/{module.question_id}" /] [aw2.get my_array.json_encode set="module.response" /] [module.return module.response /] [/templates.add]

item.title: contents-row
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
//** page parameter [if.not_empty request.draw] [aw2.set module.draw="{request.draw}" /] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [aw2.set module.draw="1"/] [/if.else] **// //** length parameter**// [if.not_empty request.length] [aw2.set module.length="{request.length}" /] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [aw2.set module.length="50"/] [/if.else] //** page parameter "s":"[aw2.get request.search /]", **// [if.equal lhs='{request.start}' rhs='0'] [aw2.set module.paged="1" /] [/if.equal] [if.else] [aw2.set module.test_paged="{request.start}/{request.length}+1"] [aw2.get module.test_paged.math set="module.paged" /] [/if.else] [module.set search_type="s" /] [if.num request.search] [module.set search_type="p" /] [/if.num] [query.posts_builder part=start] { "posts_per_page": [aw2.get module.length /], "post_type": "course_activity", "[aw2.get module.search_type]":"[aw2.get request.search /]", [if.not_empty request.post_id] "post__in":[ [aw2.get request.post_id /] ], [/if.not_empty] "post_status": "[aw2.get request.post_status default='publish' /]", "paged":[aw2.get module.paged /] } [/query.posts_builder] [query.posts_builder part=meta_query not_empty="{request.content_template}"] { "key": "content_template", "value": "[aw2.get request.content_template /]", "compare": "=" } [/query.posts_builder] [query.posts_builder part=run set=results /] [aw2.set module.response_array="" /] [aw2.set module.response_array.data="" /] [aw2.set module.response_array.draw="{request.draw}" /] [aw2.set module.found_posts="{results.found_posts}" /] [loop.@q results.posts] [aw2.set temp="" /] [aw2.set temp.new][/aw2.set] [aw2.set temp.new="{@q.item.ID}" /] [aw2.set temp.new="{@q.item.post_title}" /] [content_builder.content.single_view content_id="{@q.item.ID}" set="template.question" /] //** [aw2.set temp.new] [template.get question.activity.page_title set="module.question" /] [aw2.get template.question.activity.question set="module.question" empty="{module.question}" /] [php.strlen p1="{module.question}" set="module.question_len" /] [if.greater_than lhs="{module.question_len}" rhs="60"] [module.set question] [php.substr p1="{module.question}" p2="0" p3="60" /]..... [/module.set] [/if.greater_than] [module.get question /] [/aw2.set] **// [aw2.get @q.item.taxonomy.names.content_type.comma set="module.content_type" default='Question' /] [aw2.set temp.new] [php.get_the_title p1="{template.question.template_slug}" /] [/aw2.set] [aw2.set temp.new] [content_builder.log.user user_id="{@q.item.post_author}" set="template.user" /] [template.get user /] [/aw2.set] [aw2.set temp.new] [content_builder.log.user user_id="{@q.item.meta.approved_by}" set="template.user" /] [template.get user /] [/aw2.set] //** [aw2.set temp.new] [content_builder.log.user user_id="{@q.item.meta.last_edited_by}" set="template.user" /] [template.get user /] [/aw2.set] **// [aw2.set temp.new]
edit
[template.set post_status="
"/] [if.equal lhs="{@q.item.post_status}" rhs="publish"] [template.set post_status="
"/] [/if.equal] [aw2.get template.post_status /]
[/aw2.set] //**[aw2.set temp.new="{@q.item.post_status}" /]**// [aw2.set module.response_array.data.new="{temp}" /] [/loop.@q] [aw2.set main="module.response_array.recordsTotal"][aw2.get module.found_posts default='0' /][/aw2.set] [aw2.set main="module.response_array.recordsFiltered"][aw2.get module.found_posts default='0' /][/aw2.set] [aw2.get module.response_array.json_encode set="module.response" /] [aw2.get module.response /]
